exm.mng: to forage, to hunt for food, to scavenge, fig. to make a living
to seek happiness elsewhere (euphemism for extra-marital sex), a bit on the side

exm.cur: 踏破铁鞋无觅处，得来全不费工夫
exm.trd: 踏破鐵鞋無覓處，得來全不費工夫
exm.mng: to travel far and wide looking for sth, only to find it easily
exm.pyn: tà pò tiě xié wú mì chù , dé lái quán bù fèi gōng fu

exm.mng: to search for the right word (of poet)
lit. lock the door and search for the right word (idiom); fig. the serious hard work of writing
see 騎驢找驢|骑驴找驴[qi2 lu:2 zhao3 lu:2]
